title: RMT strikes expected to bring London tube to a halt for four days
description: Buses and trains likely to be overcrowded as union members take action in row over pay and 32-hour week
content:
Strikes by tube staff are due to start on Friday, in a series of walkouts that are expected to close the London Underground entirely for four days from Monday.
Londoners have been urged to check before travel next week, with virtually no tube service... [3585 chars]

title: Joe Biden has skin cancer surgery - months after 'aggressive' prostate cancer diagnosis
description: The 82-year-old revealed in May he had been diagnosed with prostate cancer that had spread to his bones.
content:
Former US president Joe Biden has had surgery for skin cancer, his spokesperson has said.
It's unclear when he had the procedure, but video from late August showed him leaving church in Delaware with a large, fresh scar on his head.
The spokesperson ... [1237 chars]

title: Silksong demand prompts Steam and game store crash
description: Social media users also struggle to grab the game on the Nintendo, PlayStation and Xbox game stores.
content:

title: Trump to rebrand the Pentagon as the 'Department of War'
description: The president's controversial move could cost tens of millions, with letterheads and building signs in the US and at military bases around the world potentially needing a refresh.
content:
Donald Trump is to rebrand the US Department of Defense as the "Department of War", according to the White House.
The president will today sign an executive order allowing it to be used as a secondary title for the US government's biggest organisatio... [1965 chars]

title: Women and girls in Northern Ireland face 'perfect storm' of violence as victims call for tougher sentences
description: An "eye-watering" 98% of women in Northern Ireland have experienced some form of abuse or violence, according to a study.
content:
Victims are calling for stiffer sentencing guidelines for those convicted of violence against women in Northern Ireland as it grapples with a femicide record described as an "epidemic".
Twenty-eight women and a girl have been violently killed in Nort... [4823 chars]
